channel.title: How do I...?
channel.description:
[url=http://deathkillers.smfforfree2.com]On P16 V.6, how do I make someone Admin? And how do I make it save my char? You can join and help me, cuz the server is working, hope ur on when I am then... I am The Ma there.
And on TestScape, how do I make meself Admin there? The character-rights: 3 don't work, and there is no admin or mod file either, the only really working source I have is PimpScape[/url]

item.title: How do I...?
item.dc:creator: @EATALOT2002 EATALOT2002
item.description:
@EATALOT2002 wrote:

you have to go to char file then change the player rights to 2 or 3 i forget then save changes, compile and run…

-eatalot2002
